author: gem-sw
body:
Additions/modifications to code:
- ME1/1:
  ALCT-GEM stubs with high quality and straight pattern in ME1/a and ME1/b
  ALCT-CLCT-GEM stubs with with high quality  in ME1/a and ME1/b
- ME2/1:
  ALCT-GEM stubs with high quality and straight pattern
  ALCT-CLCT-GEM stubs with with high quality 
- ME3/1-ME4/1:
  ALCT-CLCT-RPC stubs with with high quality 
  First version of CSC-RPC local integrated trigger. Not deployed yet.
title: 2nd prototype of GEM-CSC-RPC local integrated trigger algorithm
